title: NEL service disruption due to signalling fault

updates.text: 8.03pm: NEL is now back to regular svc. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
7.56pm: NEL svc is slightly delayed due to a signalling fault at Harbourfront Stn. Please expect a delay of abt 3mins for both directions.
7.30pm: NEL svc is delayed due to a signalling fault at Harbourfront Stn. Additional travel time abt 10mins is expected for both directions.
NEL svc twds HarbourFront is delayed due to a signalling fault. Additional travel time of about 10mins may be expected for both bounds.
